page.description: FormView CSS defaults used for styling the layout.

description.p: The default class name for all Items in the FormView layout.
Specify the CSS class name to apply when a field is selected. If you leave the *[ui:Selected]* property blank, the class called 'formValueSelected' is applied.
Specify the CSS class name to apply when edits that are made in an editor are 'echoed' back to the Form. If you leave the *[ui:Echo]* property blank, the class called 'formValueEcho' is applied.
Specify the CSS class name to apply when a field is dirty. If you leave the *[ui:Dirty]* property blank, the class called 'formValueDirty' is applied.
Specify the CSS class name to apply when a field has an error. If you leave the *[ui:Error]* property blank, the class called 'formValueError' is applied.
Specify the CSS class name to apply to the error message that is shown when a field has an error. If you leave the *[ui:Error text]* property blank, the class called 'formErrorText' is applied.
Specify the CSS class name to apply when a field has a write conflict error. If you leave the *[ui:Conflict]* property blank, the class called 'formValueWriteConflict' is applied.
